general.title: Photograph, View of Climax Observing Station
general.description: Black and white photograph depicting the Climax Observing Station. Caption reads, "A view of Climax Observing Station looking north from Chalk Mountain. On the left is the large dome housing the new 16" coronagraph. The 5" coronagraph and flare patrol are in the small dome. Far to the right can be seen residences of staff and guests. In the distance can be seen the tailing pond of the Climax Molybdenum Co."
